lines.text: Enter two Soldiers to their guard

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Brother, good night: tomorrow is the day.

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: It will determine one way: fare you well. Heard you of nothing strange about the streets

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Nothing. What news

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: Belike tis but a rumour. Good night to you.

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Well, sir, good night.
Enter two other Soldiers

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: Soldiers, have careful watch.

lines.speaker: third soldier
lines.text: And you. Good night, good night.
They place themselves in every corner of the stage

lines.speaker: fourth soldier
lines.text: Here we: and if tomorrow Our navy thrive, I have an absolute hope Our landmen will stand up.

lines.speaker: third soldier
lines.text: Tis a brave army, And full of purpose.
Music of the hautboys as under the stage

lines.speaker: fourth soldier
lines.text: Peace! what noise

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: List, list!

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: Hark!

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Music i the air.

lines.speaker: third soldier
lines.text: Under the earth.

lines.speaker: fourth soldier
lines.text: It signs well, does it not

lines.speaker: third soldier
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Peace, I say! What should this mean

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: Tis the god Hercules, whom Antony loved, Now leaves him.

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Walk lets see if other watchmen Do hear what we do
They advance to another post

lines.speaker: second soldier
lines.text: How now, masters!

lines.speaker: all
lines.text: [Speaking together]  How now! How now! do you hear this

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Ay ist not strange

lines.speaker: third soldier
lines.text: Do you hear, masters do you hear

lines.speaker: first soldier
lines.text: Follow the noise so far as we have quarter Lets see how it will give off.

lines.speaker: all
lines.text: Content. Tis strange.
Exeunt
